titlestmt.titleproper: Coalition of Lifetime Learning Organizations (COLLO) Records

The adult education holdings are collectively known as the
.

did.head: Overview of the Collection
did.unittitle: Coalition of Lifetime Learning Organizations (COLLO) Records
did.abstract: American adult education organization. Collection contains material relating to COLLO's formation, organization, and operation.

bioghist.head: Biographical History
bioghist.p: "The Coalition of Lifelong Learning Organizations (COLLO) was started decades ago as a coalition of organizations working to advance adult and lifelong learning. [It brings] together leaders of these organizations to advance knowledge, find common ground, and take collective action to benefit adult learners in areas like access, cost, and removal of barriers to participation in education at all levels...[Its focus is on] awareness building, advocacy, input on and support of legislation at the state and national levels and in collective action where consensus can be achieved." [From the organization's website, http://www.thecollo.org/.

COLLO is a successor organization to the Coalition of Adult Education Organizations (CAEO), which was formed in the early 1960s as adult educators recognized the need for greater interaction among adult education organizations.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents of the Collection
scopecontent.p: The Coalition of Lifetime Learning Organizations (COLLO) Records consists of material relating to COLLO, its formation, organization, and operation.

arrangement.head: Arrangement of the Collection
arrangement.p: The collection is unprocessed and remains in original order.

relatedmaterial.head: Related Material
relatedmaterial.p: The library holds a considerable number of collections related to adult and continuing education. Please refer to &subjindex; for a complete listing of all adult education collections. In particular, see also the Coalition of Adult Education Organizations (CAEO) Records.

controlaccess.head: Subject and Genre Headings
controlaccess.corpname: Coalition of lifetime learning organizations -- Records.
controlaccess.subject: Adult education.

accessrestrict.head: Access Restrictions
accessrestrict.p: The collection is currently unprocessed and not available for research. Please contact &scrc_name; for more information.

userestrict.head: Use Restrictions
userestrict.p: Written permission must be obtained from SCRC and all relevant rights holders before publishing quotations, excerpts or images from any materials in this collection.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Preferred citation for this material is as follows:

Coalition of Lifetime Learning Organizations (COLLO) Records,
&su_name;

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: Gift of the Coalition of Lifetime Learning Organizations (COLLO), 2015.

note.p: An inventory has not yet been created for this collection. Please contact the Repository listed above for more information.
